title: Artist Feature: Jakub Hošek

excerpt.full: Jakub Hošek is a painter with a necessity to disturb. Featuring mangled and grotesque imagery, combined with vivid colours, Hošek finds himself with something that appalls as well as engages. Put simply, Hošek is a painter, but it’s the subtle influences of illustration and drawings that crawl awkwardly over the canvas, that give the work \[…\]
